MS MCQs

    Automate the installation and configuration of software in your Virtual Machines

    »

    1. You need to configure a Linux virtual machine during installation. Which file do you need to use to customize your installation?

      A PowerShell script with a series of cmdlets and configuration settings.

      A JSON file that defines the operating system version and optional software.

      A YAML-based cloud-init configuration file with a series of packages to install and commands to run.

      An INI file with a series of key/value pairs that define your installation settings.


    2. Before you create a virtual machine, you need to configure which of the following networking components?

      A Virtual Network, a Network Firewall Rule, and a Network Interface.

      A Network Security Group, a Virtual Network, a Public IP Address, and a Network Interface.

      A Network Interface, a Network Firewall Rule, and a Public IP Address.

      A Virtual Network, a Network Security Group, a Virtual IP Rule, and a Network Interface.


    3. You need to configure a Windows virtual machine during installation. Which file do you need to use to customize your installation?

      An INI file with a series of key/value pairs that define your installation settings.

      A PowerShell script with a series of cmdlets and configuration settings.

      A YAML-based cloud-init configuration file with a series of packages to install and commands to run.

      A JSON file that defines the operating system version and optional software.
